member.name: T:Microsoft.Kinect.Toolkit.Input.IPressableModel
member.summary: The interface implemented by the PressableModel Kinect Toolkit input element.

member.name: E:Microsoft.Kinect.Toolkit.Input.IPressableModel.Holding
member.summary: Occurs when a pressing gesture of a pressable Kinect Toolkit input element is being held.

member.name: E:Microsoft.Kinect.Toolkit.Input.IPressableModel.PressingStarted
member.summary: Occurs when a pressing gesture of a pressable Kinect Toolkit input element has started.

member.name: E:Microsoft.Kinect.Toolkit.Input.IPressableModel.PressingCompleted
member.summary: Occurs when a pressing gesture of a pressable Kinect Toolkit input element has completed.

member.name: E:Microsoft.Kinect.Toolkit.Input.IPressableModel.PressingUpdated
member.summary: Occurs when a pressing gesture of a pressable Kinect Toolkit input element has been updated.

member.name: E:Microsoft.Kinect.Toolkit.Input.IPressableModel.Tapped
member.summary: Occurs when a pressable Kinect Toolkit input element has been tapped.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Kinect.Toolkit.Input.ManipulatableModel
member.summary: Maintains data and state for a manipulatable Kinect Toolkit input element.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Kinect.Toolkit.Input.ManipulatableModel.#ctor(WindowsPreview.Kinect.Input.KinectGestureSettings)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ManipulatableModel that maintains data and state for a Kinect Toolkit input element.
member.param: The Kinect gesture settings to use for the input element.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ManipulatableModel that maintains data and state for a Kinect Toolkit input element.
member.param: The Kinect gesture settings to use for the input element.
The object that represents the input element.

member.name: E:Microsoft.Kinect.Toolkit.Input.ManipulatableModel.ManipulationCompleted
member.summary: Occurs when a manipulation gesture associated with the Kinect Toolkit input element completes.

member.name: E:Microsoft.Kinect.Toolkit.Input.ManipulatableModel.ManipulationInertiaStarting
member.summary: Occurs when the user has completed a manipulation gesture associated with the Kinect Toolkit input element and the inertial phase of the gesture starts.

member.name: E:Microsoft.Kinect.Toolkit.Input.ManipulatableModel.ManipulationStarted
member.summary: Occurs when a manipulation gesture associated with the Kinect Toolkit input element starts.

member.name: E:Microsoft.Kinect.Toolkit.Input.ManipulatableModel.ManipulationUpdated
member.summary: Occurs when a manipulation gesture associated with the Kinect Toolkit input element is updated.

member.summary: Attaches the Kinect Toolkit input element to the the specified KinectGestureRecognizer Class.
member.param: The KinectGestureRecognizer Class from which the input element should be detached.
The settings to be used by the gesture recognizer.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Kinect.Toolkit.Input.ManipulatableModel.CompleteGesture
member.summary: Finalizes a gesture.

member.summary: Detaches the Kinect Toolkit input element from the specified KinectGestureRecognizer Class.
member.param: The KinectGestureRecognizer Class from which the input element should be detached.

member.summary: Initializes the extent and client size of the Kinect Toolkit input element.

The extent height.
The client width.
The client height.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Kinect.Toolkit.Input.ManipulatableModel.ProcessInertia
member.summary: Performs inertia calculations and raises associated inertia events.

A boolean value indicating whether an ongoing press gesture should be ended.

member.summary: Completes all in-progress gestures associated with the specified KinectPointerPoint Class.
member.param: The identifier of the KinectPointerPoint Class object for which the gestures should be completed.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Kinect.Toolkit.Input.InputPointerManager.CompleteGestures
member.summary: Completes all in-progress gestures and clears the map of captured elements.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Kinect.Toolkit.Input.InputPointerManager.CompleteGesture(System.UInt32,Microsoft.Kinect.Toolkit.Input.IInputModel)
member.summary: Completes a gesture associated with the specified KinectPointerPoint Class and Kinect Toolkit input element.
member.param: The identifier of the KinectPointerPoint Class object for which the gesture should be completed.
The Kinect Toolkit input element for the gesture should be completed.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Kinect.Toolkit.Input.InputPointerManager.GetCapturedInputModel(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Gets the HitTestResult object containing the captured Kinect Tookit input elements associated with the specified KinectPointerPoint Class.
member.param: The identifier of the KinectPointerPoint Class for which captured input elements should be retrieved.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Kinect.Toolkit.Input.InputPointerManager.HandlePointerAsCursor(WindowsPreview.Kinect.Input.KinectPointerPoint,Windows.Foundation.Rect,Microsoft.Kinect.Toolkit.Input.HitTestResult)
member.summary: Instructs the input pointer manager to handle the pointer as a cursor.
member.param: The pointer to use as a cursor.
The region whithin which the cursor is confined.
The HitTestResult which will be updated with the input elements capture by the pointer.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Kinect.Toolkit.Input.IKinectEngagementManager
member.summary: The interface implemented by a Kinect engagement manager.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Kinect.Toolkit.Input.IKinectEngagementManager.EngagedBodyHandPairsChanged
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the body/hand pairs that are currently engaged have changed.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Kinect.Toolkit.Input.IKinectEngagementManager.StartManaging
member.summary: Requests the engagement manager to start managing the engagement of body/hand pairs.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Kinect.Toolkit.Input.IKinectEngagementManager.StopManaging
member.summary: Requests the engagement manager to stop managing the engagement of body/hand pairs.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Kinect.Toolkit.Input.IKinectEngagementManager.KinectManualEngagedHands
member.summary: Gets the list of the body/hand pairs that have been manually set as engaged.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Kinect.Toolkit.Input.IInputModel
member.summary: The base interface implemented by the ManipulatableModel and PressableModel Kinect Toolkit input elements.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Kinect.Toolkit.Input.IInputModel.HasCaptureChanged
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the capture status of the Kinect Toolkit input element has changed.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Kinect.Toolkit.Input.IInputModel.HasCapture
member.summary: Gets an boolean value indicating whether the Kinect Toolkit input element has been captured with a gesture.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Kinect.Toolkit.Input.IInputModel.IsManipulatable
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the associated Kinect Toolkit input element supports manipulation gestures.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Kinect.Toolkit.Input.IInputModel.CapturedPointerId
member.summary: Gets the identifier of the KinectPointerPoint Class with which the Kinect Toolkit input element was captured.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Kinect.Toolkit.Input.IInputModel.Element
member.summary: Gets the object that represents the Kinect Toolkit input element.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Kinect.Toolkit.Input.IInputModel.GestureRecognizer
member.summary: Gets or sets the KinectGestureRecognizer Class object associated with the Kinect Toolkit input element.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Kinect.Toolkit.Input.IInputModel.CompleteGesture
member.summary: Completes the gesture associated with Kinect Toolkit input element.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Kinect.Toolkit.Input.IManipulatableModel
member.summary: The interface implemented by the ManipulatableModel Kinect Toolkit input element.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Kinect.Toolkit.Input.IInputModel.ProcessPointerMove(WindowsPreview.Kinect.Input.KinectPointerPoint,Windows.Foundation.Collections.IMap{System.UInt32,Microsoft.Kinect.Toolkit.Input.HitTestResult,Microsoft.Kinect.Toolkit.Input.HitTestResult},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Processes the movement of the pointer associated with the Kinect Toolkit input element.
member.param: The KinectPointerPoint Class associated with the pointer move event.
A map of KinectPointerPoint.PointerId Property values to objects indicating the hit test results associated with each pointer point.
A boolean value indicating whether an ongoing press gesture should be ended.

member.name: E:Microsoft.Kinect.Toolkit.Input.IManipulatableModel.ManipulationInertiaStarting
member.summary: Occurs when the user has finished a manipulation gesture of a manipulatable Kinect Toolkit input element and the inertial phase of the gesture has begun.

member.name: E:Microsoft.Kinect.Toolkit.Input.IManipulatableModel.ManipulationStarted
member.summary: Occurs when a manipulation gesture of a manipulatable Kinect Toolkit input element has started.

member.name: E:Microsoft.Kinect.Toolkit.Input.IManipulatableModel.ManipulationUpdated
member.summary: Occurs when the manipulation status of a manipulatable Kinect Toolkit input element has changed.

member.name: E:Microsoft.Kinect.Toolkit.Input.IManipulatableModel.ManipulationCompleted
member.summary: Occurs when a manipulation gesture of a manipulatable Kinect Toolkit input element has completed.
